numlitem.para: Approach minimums do not require its use, and
Center is selected and isolation is verified once each flight day.
For all operations at least 2 IRS's are required for autoland operation. The operative IRS's must be associated with the engaged autopilots.
Downgrade aircraft category dispatch status to CAT 3a with left IRS inoperative.

placard.para: Placard affected IRS Mode Selector on the Inertial Reference Mode Panel (M59) "INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Log.

note.para: The repetitive inspection required when this item is inoperative must be documented in the Aircraft Logbook at the prescribed intervals. (Refer to GMM, Chapter 3, Section 6.)

maintenance.para: Deferral of this item requires downgrading to the status indicated in the A/C STATUS DISPATCH column below.

numlitem.para: For left IRU at Captain’s Instrument Source Select Panel, select IRS ALTN and leave in this position.

para.emphasis: Verify isolation each flight day by:

numlitem.para: Switching one of the operating IRUs to ALIGN.
Verify that one (not both) pilot’s EADI and EHSI lose attitude and heading information.
Switch the IRU back to NAV.
